help-file.title: CONSENT
help-file.content:
"Consent" is a check performed by the MUD code in order to confirm that a player (victim) is agreeing to the action being performed upon him or her by another player.
Usage: consent <name> -you give your undying trust to <name> consent -you revoke consent consent who -lists all players that have given you consent
You may only consent to one person at a time, but you can change it as often as you wish. The person you are consenting to need not be in the room with you, but you must be able to see him/her. (If who <name> doesn't work, neither will consent <name>).
